title: Rustdoc ICE "Unable to fulfill trait"

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
This bug occurs with `cargo doc`. `cargo build` works fine. ### Code ```Rust pub trait Trait1 {} pub trait Trait2 { type Type2; } pub trait Trait3 { type Type3; } impl Trait2 for Struct1 { type Type2 = Struct1; } impl Trait2 for Vec { type Type2 = Vec; } impl Trait3 for T { type Type3 = Struct1; } impl Trait3 for Vec { type Type3 = Vec; } pub struct Struct1 { pub ty: T, } pub struct Question { pub ins: < as Trait3>::Type3 as Trait2>::Type2, } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0-nightly (eb4fc71dc 2020-12-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: eb4fc71dc9024f15a0c9cc44bcc10c861e9d585e commit-date: 2020-12-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0-nightly ``` ### Error output ``` cargo doc Documenting bad v0.1.0 (/home/jacob/scratch/bad) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Unable to fulfill trait DefId(2:2069 ~ core[27a9]::marker::Send) for 'Question': [FulfillmentError(Obligation(predicate=TraitPredicate(<<::Type3 as Trait2>::Type2 as std::marker::Send>), depth=4),Unimplemented)]', /rustc/eb4fc71dc9024f15a0c9cc44bcc10c861e9d585e/compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/auto_trait.rs:193:17 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic error: Unrecognized option: 'crate-version' error: could not document `bad` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name bad src/lib.rs -o /home/jacob/scratch/bad/target/doc --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi -L dependency=/home/jacob/scratch/bad/target/debug/deps --crate-version 0.1.0` (exit code: 1) ```
Backtrace

``` cargo doc Documenting bad v0.1.0 (/home/jacob/scratch/bad) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Unable to fulfill trait DefId(2:2069 ~ core[27a9]::marker::Send) for 'Question': [FulfillmentError(Obligation(predicate=TraitPredicate(<<::Type3 as Trait2>::Type2 as std::marker::Send>), depth=4),Unimplemented)]', /rustc/eb4fc71dc9024f15a0c9cc44bcc10c861e9d585e/compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/auto_trait.rs:193:17 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f9d8fa8e6c7 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h746c3e9529d524bc at /rustc/eb4fc71dc9024f15a0c9cc44bcc10c861e9d585e/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:90:5 1: 0x7f9d8fa8e6c7 -
